1113121.content:
Sometime after the war against Yhwach, Soul Society had finally gotten back into a sense of peace and stability. In fact, Captain Shinji and the other Vizard in the Gotei 13 were allowed to take a vacation so they all went to the Human World with the rest of the Vizard to have some fun. What this meant for Momo was that, as the Lieutenant of the 5th Division, she was in charge of the 5th Division for the time being.

But since things were so peaceful at the moment, she wanted to spend some time with her childhood friend, Toshiro. After some convincing, Toshiro agreed and so he and Momo found themselves eating watermelon at the 5th Division.

"Isn't this nice, Shiro-chan? I can't remember the last time the two of us were able to just sit and eat watermelon together," said Momo as she swallowed a bite.

"Yeah, me neither. And don't call me Shiro-chan, Bedwetter Momo. And it's Captain Hitsugaya."

"I'm not a bedwetter anymore, I haven't done that in many years. I really wish you wouldn't be so uptight in what I call you. We've known each other snce we were kids."

Toshiro didn't respond as he continued to eat and Momo looked a little sad at him.

'I really wish Shiro-chan wouldn't be so uptight all the time. He needs to relax. Captain Shinji and his friends may be on vacation, but I hope I can get Shiro-chan to have a little vacation as well,' thought Momo to herself.

After they were done eating, Momo was ablt to convince him to stay at the 5th Division (partly due to asking him to bring his remaining paperwork there) and soon time flew that it was time to go to bed.

"It's time to sleep, I'll see you later," said Toshiro as he was about to leave.

"Come on, Shiro-chan. Why don't you stay the night?" asked Momo.

"Where would I sleep? It wouldn't be right for me to sleep in Captain Hirako's room and there are no other open rooms."

"Actually, there is one. The 5th Division hasn't had a 3rd Seat in a while and so no one sleeps in that room. You were a 3rd Seat before, it should be alright."

Before Toshiro could even respond, Momo grabbed his hand and led him to the vacant 3rd Seat room. As she got there and pushed him inside, Toshiro finally found his voice.

"This is absurd! I'm the 10th Division Captain. I can't stay in the room that's meant for a 3rd Seat!"

"Oh come on, relax a little," said Momo as she sneeked around Toshiro and took off his captain haori. "It's just for one night."

Toshiro wanted to argue, but he stopped when he looked at Momo. He couldn't tell if she was angry or sad and so he just closed his mouth and nodded his head.

"Yay! Good night, 3rd Seat Shiro-chan!" said Momo as she hugged him for a moment and went to her own room, taking Toshiro's captain haori with her.

'I don't know why, but just the thought of Shiro-chan being my 3rd Seat really makes me happy. I'm sure he could relax more if he didn't have all his responsibilities as a Captain. Even if it's just for the night, I'll enjoy having Shiro-chan as my 3rd Seat', thought Momo to herself, completely unaware of the changes that would occur that would give her the chance to have Toshiro reassigned as the 3rd Seat of the 5th Division, right under her.

Back to Toshiro, he was so flustered by what had just happened that he went straight to bed without going to the bathroom first.
1113121.title: Yes.

choices: Momo comes back with just a new Shinigami uniform.

11131211.content:
The next morning, Momo woke up in a good mood at having her childhood friend stay the night at the 5th Division. After getting cleaned up for the day, she went to the 3rd Seat room and chuckled a bit about Toshiro staying in that room. As she opened up the door and walked to the bed, her eyes widened in surprise.

"Oh mu god! Shiro-chan, what have you done?" said Momo as she was trying not to bust out laughing.

"W-what's going on?" asked a tired Toshiro. "Hinamori, what's the big idea?"

Momo pointed at him and sad, "Look what you did in the middle of the night."

Toshiro raised his eyebrow a bit and looked down, only to be horrified at what he saw. He had wet the bed.

"What happened? This doesn't make sense. I-"

"I think it's pretty obvious what you did. Right, Bedwetter Shiro-chan."

Toshiro remained silent as he blushed at the way Momo had merged their respective childhood nicknames. They both knew that from now on, Toshiro could never complain about how Momo addressed him ever again.

"Let's get these sheets and clothes in the washer, Shiro-chan," said Momo.

"Y-yeah, of course, Hinamori."

"That's Lieutenant Momo to you," said Momo with a little smirk.

Toshiro then helped Momo get the sheets off and took off his clothes as Momo took them to the washer.

"Now, stay right here, Shiro-chan. I'll be back with some new clothes for you."

"Okay, Lieutenant Hinamori," said Toshiro in a defeated voice.

Momo beamed at the way Toshiro addressed her and left him alone in his room. Toshiro was anxious and afraid of what Momo would do to him when she got back. Soon enough, Momo came into the room again and...

1212331.content:
"Is this what you really want?"

It felt weird to be asked by their second oldest to be babied again - not that Marge was complaining in the slightest - the idea of having sweet little Lisa back in her arms after all these years felt very comforting and reassuring. It was possibly a sign that her daughter wasn't growing up as fast as she had first imagined, and if it meant doing this little activity to further her bond with Lisa, then she'll happily do it.

A moment in, and Lisa and Marge entered Maggie's bedroom. The two stood in the middle of the room, with Lisa ocassionally dipping her head and forcing her gaze away from her mother before finally finding the courage to speak. "It's suposed to help the people involved relax, according to a study on the Internet; it helps the people involved decrease their stress levels, build stronger bonds and it provides a sense of escapism from the torment of modern life."

"I suppose so, sweetie." Marge responded with a light hum, a confident smile grew across her lips. "If you've read it on the Internet and did your research, then we'll give it a shot. If it doesn't work, then that's that."

"Oh," Lisa smiled back, "And another thing; I don't think there's any of Maggie's diapers that are going to fit me, so I might need some adult diapers instead."

"That's nonsense, Lisa." Marge replied, "You'd be surprised at how stretchy Maggie's diapers are. They'd fit you perfectly."

A single diaper was taken from the changing table; instantly revealing the sudden large size of the padded undergarment to Lisa, who's smile had dropped to a look of wonderment and slight embarrassment. "That's a little larger than I expected," She nervously giggled.

A silence dawned over both Lisa and Marge, with Lisa slowly climbing to the top of the changing table without prompt, leading Marge to slowly undress her daughter. Her red skirt, shoes, pearls and basic white panties were removed leaving the eight-year old virtually naked on the table. The diaper was unfolded and was expertly laid underneath Lisa's backside, the tapes soon followed and were tighly planted on the front with ease from Marge's years of experience.

The second part of the change came in the form of a familiar red pacifier that was quickly sunk in-between Lisa's lips, thanks to Marge, resulting in her starting to suckle on the invading object with her worries and doubt's slowly fading into the back of her mind. Her body felt limp, her legs were spread outward thanks to the diaper's thick absorbent layers and her mind was riddled with the conflicting thoughts on what she was about to participate in.

And finally, Marge had pulled out one of Maggie's blue onesie's. The onesie itself was dipped over Lisa's head and arms while it fell and lowered itself down to her crotch, barely covering the thick diaper that she was wearing.

By slowly leaning up, Lisa had realized that she was now in Maggie's position. Her desire for this had been building up, and now she had the opportunity to relax and act accordingly.

What's the first activity that Lisa decides to do, now that she's a baby again?

12432222.content:
Meg Griffin had been regressed to a baby.
How?
Herbert had invented a ray to turn himself eighteen again.
"Well, here you go, Herbert. You get those little boys' popsicles." he said.
Herbert flipped on his ray.
It ricocheted off the mirror and out the window, hitting Meg.
Meg started crying, scared.
Lois ran into her room and saw her daughter, a baby, on the floor.
"Oh, Meg! My little girl!" Lois said, shocked. She picked up Meg and patted her back, rocking her. "Peter! Come here!" Lois called. Peter walked upstairs. "What is it, Lois?" he asked. "Look, it's- Peter, why are you wearing swim trunks?" Lois asked. "Because Quagmire and I are going to have a water war." Peter answered. A water balloon sailed through the widow and hit Peter in the back of the head. "Son of a bitch!" Peter said. "Hold on, Lois. I have to go deal with this." Peter walked outside. Lois heard him as he talked to Quagmire. "Quagmire, I told you, no inside the house projectiles!" Peter said. He walked back inside and went upstairs. "Sorry, Lois. So, what were you saying?" Lois sighed. "Look, Peter." she said, holding up Meg. "Lois, did you have another kid? I don't remember you getting fat." Peter said. "Thanks a lot, Peter. No, I did not have another baby. This is our little girl." Lois answered. "Meg?!" Peter asked, shocked. "How did this happen?" "I don't know. I heard crying in her room and there she was, on the floor, crying." Lois answered. "Well, how old is she?" Peter asked. "From the looks of it, two months." Lois answered. "Well, if Meg got younger, I wonder if anything happened to Stewie." Peter said.
Meanwhile, Stewie was inventing an aging ray, so he could grow up and move out. It was faulty, because he only aged a few years. He was sixteen. "Mom, Dad, I think something's wrong with Stewie. He's not a baby." Chris said, looking freaked out. Stevie walked into the room, looking different. He had long, brown hair that nearly covered his eyes. "Dad, if I'm the only one in this family who isn't growing up or getting younger, does that mean I'm a ghost?" Chris asked, scared. "Probably." Peter answered. Chris ran out of the house, terrified. Meg started crying again. Lois rubbed her back and rocked her again. "Hi Stewie." Peter said. "Hey." Stewie nodded. He walked away. "Stewie turned out really cool." Peter said. "Peter, can you go fid Chris? I'm going to change Meg's diaper." Lois said. "I will not fail this mission, Chief." Peter saluted. He ran outside and mounted a segway. Lois walked upstairs, Meg in her arms. "It's ok sweetheart. Mommy's got you." she said. Lois went into Stewie's room, which still had his crib and changing table. Lois lay Meg on the changing table and unstrapped her dirty diaper. She took it off, wiped Meg's bum and powdered her. Lois put her daughter in a new diaper and picked her up. Meg smiled, glad.

124322221.content:
"Peter, I'm going to the mall to get new baby clothes for Meg. I should be back in a few hours. Can you babysit?" Lois said. "Yeah. Sure." Peter said. "Ok. I'll be back by four." Lois said, leaving.
Peter was feeding Meg a bottle when Lois got home. "Aw." she said, walking upstairs.
Lois was moving Stewie's old crib and changing table into Meg's room, and Meg's bed into Stewie's room. Stewie painted it black and Lois went to start making dinner. "Peter, can you go change Meg's diaper before dinner?" Lois asked from the kitchen. "Yeah, alright." Peter said. He picked Meg up from her swing and walked upstairs. Lois was setting the table when Peter walked back in. "Where's Meg? Did you change her diaper like I asked?" Lois asked. "Well, I started to, but she just kept going and going, so it was really full and then I wanted Kool Aid." Peter said. Stewie walked in, carrying Meg. "She's good." he said. "Thank you, Stewie." Lois said, taking Meg. Stewie looked at Peter. "Next time, just do us a favor and change your own kid's diaper." he said.
That night, after dinner, Lois was feeding Meg in her room. "I love you, sweetheart." Lois said. Meg looked up at her mother with bright eyes and reached up her hands to touch Lois's face. Lois smiled. Meg finished her bottle and Lois put her up to her shoulder to burp her. When Meg burped, Lois stood. "Ok Meg, it's time for bed." she said. Lois changed Meg into a pair of footies and put her in her bassinet. "Goodnight sweetheart. I love you." Lois said, kissing Meg's forehead. Lois left quietly and went back downstairs.
"Aw, Peter, you should see Meg. She looks like such a little angel." Lois said. Peter went upstairs silently and looked in at Meg.
"She looked so peaceful." Peter said. "Looked?" Lois asked. "Yeah. Looked." Peter answered. "What do you mean?"Lois asked. Meg started crying. "Peter, what did you do?!" Lois said, running upstairs. She ran into her and Peter's room, where Meg's bassinet was, and picked up her baby. "Meg, sweetie, what's wrong? Did daddy scare you?" Lois asked. She rubbed Meg's back to calm her and rocked her. Meg stopped crying after another couple minutes and Lois kissed her cheek. She put Meg back in her bassinet and she fell asleep.
The next morning, Lois woke up to see Meg still asleep. She walked to the bathroom to get dressed and ready for the day. By the time Lois was done, Meg had waken up. Lois picked her up and Meg smiled. Lois changed Meg and took her downstairs to feed her.
Stewie was jamming to heavy metal with headphones in. Chris was still trying to process if he was actually a ghost or not. And Brian was writing. Lois was feeding Meg her bottle, talking to her. choices: Shego convinces Drakken to do the dirty work (I am so punny)
12513112222221.content:
Kim Possible was sitting in her room that afternoon, finishing up her homework.
She had just gotten through chemistry, geometry, global and was now on french.
Suddenly, her window shattered and Kim was taken.
Kim woke up after a few hours, tied to a chair.
"Why if it isn't Kimberly Anne Possible!" came a very familiar voice.
Too familiar.
"Drakken. Why am I not surprised?" Kim asked. "You're...you're not surprised?" Drakken asked. "No, I'm not." Kim answered. "Well, that doesn't matter right now. You see, I need someone to raise as a minion. Someone I can raise to be less evil than I myself." Drakken said. "Evil? Ha! That's hilarious." came the voice of Shego, as she stepped out of the shadows. "You don't think I'm evil?" Drakken asked. "Please. You're abut as evil as a playground bully." Shego scoffed. "Well, I'll show you, Shego!" Drakken said. He grabbed his ray gun, aimed at Kim and shot.
Kim was now an infant.
"How's that for evil?!" Drakken said. "It isn't." Shego said.
"Well," Drakken said. "What about this?" He picked up Kim by her ankle. "Still not." Shego said.
"Well, how about if I-"
Drakken stopped mid sentence.
"What?" Shego said.
"Dr. D? Answer me." Shego said, becoming annoyed.
"Here. You can change her." Drakken said, handing the wailing Kim to Shego.
"But-" Shego started. She looked at Kim. "What am I supposed to do?! Dr. D!"
But Drakken was already gone.
Shego looked at Kim and sighed.
"You smell terrible." she said, carrying off the ginger baby.
12513112222221.title: Baby Kim

125131122222211.content:
Shego didn't really know what she was supposed to do first.
She took a diaper, some wipes and baby powder from the bag.
She opened the baby's diaper, wiped her and taped her into the clean one.
After throwing away the dirty diaper, Shego picked up Kim and put her in a playpen.
She left to help Drakken with a new invention.
Kim tried sitting up in her play pen, but couldn't.
Being a tiny infant, in the hands of Shego and Drakken no less, would be terrible!
All Kim could do was lay there and try to fall asleep.
When she woke up a few hours later, Kim was hungry and wet.
Shego changed Kim and fed her, then put her back in the playpen.
Kim started crying and fidgeting.
"What now?!" Shego growled.
"Um, Shego, I think she's tired." Drakken said.
"Well then, put it to sleep!" Shego said.
"Ok." Drakken said. Shego went back to listening to her music. Drakken walked over to Kim's playpen and leaned over her. "Hm...how do you get a baby to sleep?" he wondered. Drakken tapped his chin in thought. "I know. A song. Babies like music." he said. "Now, let's see here. Maybe I can think something up." Drakken thought again for a minute before he had an idea. "Go to sleep, little baby. Shut your...tiiired eyes. She you sleep...I am...happy. So, sleep and make me a happy guy." Drakken sang. "That was the worst sound that has ever penetrated my headphones." Shego said. Kim started crying loudly. "Ok, second worst." Shego decided. She walked over to Kim's playpen. "What do you want!?" she screamed. Kim covered her face with her arms as she cried and scrunched her legs up. "Uh, Shego, I think you made things worse." Drakken said. "Shut up!" Shego said. Drakken cowered, but then got an idea. He ran off to the kitchen.
Shego looked at the scared baby Kim. She had appealed to Shego's soft side and she felt bad for the baby. Shego picked Kim up and held her. She started rubbing her back and lightly bouncing. "It's ok. I'm sorry. I won't hurt you." Shego said quietly. Kim quieted and stopped crying. Shego cradled her for another minute. Kim drifted happily off to sleep and Shego put her back in her playpen. She looked at the innocent child and smiled a little. Babies weren't so bad. In fact, Shego felt different around baby Kim. A good different. "Kimmie, I-" Shego started. She was interrupted when Drakken came back in. "Here, Shego. You need to calm down. Have some Cocoa Moo." Drakken said, handing Shego a cup of chocolate milk. "Stop saying Cocoa Moo." Shego said, annoyed.
125131122222211.title: Shego changes Kim

1251311222222111.content: Drakken had gotten the most brilliant idea he'd ever had in his life. He would make a commercial. To advertise...cocoa moo. He bustled around the kitchen. He got out everything he would need. Then, he began to film. He wore a suit. "Ever wonder what to drink when you are thirsty?" he asked, in a voice over. Drakken nodded. "Then drink this!" he screamed, throwing a class of chocolate milk at the camera. It shattered, and 'cocoa moo' dripped down the lens. "Drat!" he called. he picked up his failed commercial, and hid the evidence. He walked suspiciously out of the kitchen, whistling, hands folded behind his back. Shego walked by, carrying Kim. "Hey Dr... Wait, are you hiding something?" Shego said. "Um, no..." Drakken said. Shego looked at him. He confessed. "Clean it up, you nincompoop." she said. "Shego, your words hurt." Drakken said, putting his hand to his chest. He cleaned up the mess. "Can I have a cookie now?" he asked. "No." Shego said. He stomped away, complaining about Shego's stupid rules. He walked into his room, and pulled out his pink, glittery diary. He took out his fluffy pink pen, and began to write. "Dear Diary, 'tis I, the evil Dr. Drakken. I have had quite the productive day. First, I made a new invention. It reads people's minds. Then, I baked Peanut Butter Stickies. Lastly, I finished my essay from sophomore year of high school." he narrated, while writing.
1251311222222111.title: Drakken's Cocoa Moo

1251311222222112.content:
Shego had been thinking it through for quite some time now.
Kim had been with she and Drakken for three weeks now, and she had completely won them over.
Shego decided to adopt Kim.
"Shego, it's come to my attention that you are adopting Kim. I'm afraid I cannot let you do that." Drakken said. Shego started at him, mouth agape. "Unless I can be her adoptive father!" Drakken said. "Really?" Shego asked. "Yes!" Drakken said. "Would that mean we have to get married?" Shego asked. "Well, what better way to ask?" Drakken said. He got on his knee and pulled out a box. "Shego, will you marry me?" Drakken asked. The box contained a nail file. A big, sturdy, diamond nail file. "Oh my god." Shego said. "Yes, I will marry you!" Shego said happily. She and darken hugged and went to Kim's room. Shego picked up Kim. "Guess what, sweetie? We're going to adopt you and then we're getting married." she said. Kim squealed in delight and hugged her soon-to-be mother. Drakken hugged Shego and Kim hugged his arm. "Ok, let's go get this angel adopted." Shego said. She handed Kim to Drakken and went to get the car. Shego put Kim's carseat in the car and buckled her in. Drakken got in the driver's seat. Shego did not approve. "No, Drakken. I am driving." she said. "Aw, why do you always get to drive?" Drakken complained. "Because if I let you drive, you would get us caught." Shego said. "Aw, fine. I'll be a passenger." Drakken said, getting in the passenger seat.
Shego drove down to the adoption agency and walked inside, Drakken following with Kim in his arms.
"Well, it's official. We have a baby." Shego said. "This is the best day of my life! Let's go celebrate with some Cocoa Moo." Drakken said. "If you say Cocoa Moo one more time, you're walking home." Shego said. "Ok, fine. I won't say it anymore." Drakken agreed. "Good." Shego said. Kim started crying and fidgeting. "Before we leave, I'm going to change Kimmie." Shego said. She picked up the diaper bag and walked to the ladies' bathroom.
Drakken was waiting for Shego to return when he heard sirens. Coming straight to them. Drakken hid behind a plant and heard Kim's crying, followed by Shego yelling. "Let go of me!" she screamed. "Put the baby down and let's go." said a cop. "No! You can't take me from my family!" Shego said. Another officer took Kim from her arms and the first officer dragged a fighting Shego away. Drakken saw that the coast was clear and went to get Kim. She was sobbing uncontrollably, terrified that her mother was gone. "It's ok Kim. We'll get her back." Drakken assured his daughter. He grabbed the diaper bag and went to the car. He put Kim in her carseat and drove home. Drakken put Kim in her crib and went to work on a plan to spring Shego.
1251311222222112.title: Mommy Shego?

12513112222221121.content: Drakken is running around back at the lair, panicked. He has no clue when Shego will be back from jail. Shego walked through the door, and picked up Kim. Kim hugged her. "Shego! How did you get out?" Drakken said. "I threw a bunch of money on the floor, and all the cops dove for it. They really son't get paid enough." Shego said. She hugged Drakken. Drakken went off to the kitchen to get some celebratory cocoa moo.
12513112222221121.title: Escape

12513112222221122.content:
As Shego sat in jail that night, loathing the guards, she also cried fro being taken from her family.
"I miss you." she whispered.
The wall smashed and Shego looked up. Drakken was standing there. "Come on, Shego! Hurry!" he said.
Shego and Drakken ran out of the prison and off into the darkness.
"Hey, where's Kimmie?" Shego asked. "Oh, well, I couldn't bring a baby to a prison explosion, so I got a couple babysitters." Drakken explained. "Who?" Shego asked.
Meanwhile, back at Drakken and Shego's lair, Hego, Mego and Wego were babysitting Kim.
"No, Wego! Stop multiplying!" Mego said. "Never!" Wego said, continually doubling. Hego picked up Kim and she smiled. "Hello, Kim." Hego said.
Shego and Drakken entered the lair. Shego saw her brothers and became annoyed.
"You hired my brothers to babysit our baby?" she asked. "Well, I didn't know any other good babysitters!" Drakken said. "Hey sis." Mego said, looking at Shego. "Yeah, hi. Ok, time for you to get out, goodbye, go!" Shego said, pushing her brothers out the door. "Bye fellas. Thank you for babysitting." Drakken said. Shego slammed the door and took Kim. "I'm going to put Kimmie to bed. She shouldn't be up this late." Shego said. "Ok dear." Drakken said. Shego went upstairs and Drakken went to go make his favorite drink. Cocoa Moo.
12513112222221122.title: Breakout

125131122222212.content:
Shego backtracked and went to the living room. "Hey Dr. D." she said. "Oh, hello." Drakken said, waving. "You know, I can't really change a baby, because, well, I don't want to. So, you're going to." Shego said. "Oh, ok. Valid reasoning." Drakken said. He took Kim from Shego and carried her off.
"Um, Shego, I don't know what I'm supposed to do here." Drakken said.
"Take off the onesie and unstrap the diaper." Shego called.
"Ok. What next?" Drakken asked.
"Throw the used one away." Shego said.
Drakken walked into the room.
"Shego, there seem to be a few technical difficulties." he said.
"Where's the baby?" Shego asked.
"In the other room." Drakken answered.
"You left her alone?" Shego asked.
"Yes." Drakken answered.
"Idiot!" Shego said, running into the other room.
Kim had rolled onto her stomach and was screaming her head off.
Shego picked her up, changed her and held her.
She tried calming Kim down.
She stopped crying and Shego put Kim on her hip.
Drakken backed out of the room and ran away, fearing he would face the wrath of Shego.
125131122222212.title: Confusion

1321.content: Hey you're all probably wondering why a twelve year old is going to his thirteen year old brothers room carrying diapers and a bottle of warm milk. Now I know what some of you may think that my older brother is a bully who humiliates me for the fun of it, that is somewhat true. I guess I'll have to start from the beginning after I change my brothers diapers. Yep that's right my older brother wears diapers. Malcolm here and it all started a week ago Sunday. My family isn't religious but this Sunday for some weird reason Mom forced us to go to church she even got dad to go, course he knew like we did to stay on her good side. Her temper was legendary, her freakouts even more so. Anyway well at church I was reading about the Civil war, pretending to be looking at the hymn book. Dewey was fidgeting but stopped when my mom pinched him on the arm and gave him the you better quit or else look. Now my brother Reese was busy being his typical self. When mom turned to reprimand Dewey he got up on stage and took the pastors mike. He exclaimed their is no God to the whole congregation. Old ladies were dropping like flies, they fainted, some cried. My mom was furious, but she didn't want to make a scene instead, she got up and without a word she grabbed Reese by his ear. She led him out of the church. She thought no one could hear her but the whole church those who were still conscious to listen all heard her explosive rant. The jist of it, was "How is it that a thirteen year old acts like a spoiled brat, a baby with no concept of right and wrong. Do you want to end up like your brother Francis? Huh you think this is some joke, I'm through mister!" We left right after. Reese was in the back of the car rubbing his butt, he got spanked. This was weird cause mom hadn't spanked us since forever. Reese really pissed her off. Days after the church incident and mom still gave Reese the stink eye. Reese didn't seemed fazed. He wanted to go to military school, not for the discipline but to see our older brother Francis. Reese practically worshiped him, he was cool but I couldn't really remember him all that much except that he was just as bad if not worse than Reese. Anyway that's not the point the point is what happened that day at church led to the weird spiral of events that saw my brother Reese in diapers. My mom had grounded Reese as punishment but all it did was give Reese time to think of what else he could do to get under Moms skin. Reese was upstairs when mom got a phone call. I overheard the conversation cause I was downstairs with Dewey having a bowl of cereal and watching TV. Mom told us to turn the TV down. I did not because I wanted to do as she said, but because I wanted to hear her conversation. "I know I'm so sorry about my son. I promise you'll never see him again. Apparently we aren't the church going kind of family. NO I tired grounding him. Why yes I did spank him, but only cause I was so angry. What? Uh no I don't think the spanking worked, cause he got into some trouble at school. No not drugs, he got into a fight with, no not a student his English Teacher. Well I was thinking Military school, see it's what I did to his older brother, but he was a lost cause. Well I'm not so sure. You're sure that this will work. Well I would love for him to behave himself. My other two well they get into some trouble but not nearly as much or as big as my second oldest. Mrs. uh forgive but what was your name again? Oh that's right Mrs. Garrison, I thank you for your advice. I'll be sure to drop off a little something for the bake sale, and tell you how it goes. Okay bye bye, and thanks again, but to be honest I'm not holding my breath. I was confused by the conversation, but I did gather that mom was going to try a new form of discipline. Mrs.Garrison before retirement ran a boys home, so I was curious as to what methods would an older woman use to control a home of twenty boys. Even if she could I doubt she ever met a kid as defiant as Reese. A couple of days after Mrs. Garrison called mom sat all of us down except Reese. Reese was at detention, again. "Now as you all know Reese's behavior as of lately has been less than admirable. What I'm gonna ask you may sound, well quite frankly it is weird, but we got to try it. I'm not gonna fail as a parent again. "Well honey what are you purposing?" Dad asked, he was a curious as we were. She explained it to us. Dewey was in tears from laughing so hard. Me and Dad had puzzled looks on our faces. "So let me get this straight you want all of us to baby Reese?" Dad asked. Mom said, "Yes, I know it's a little out there but look Mrs. Garrison must've been onto something cause all of her boys are in college rather than a military boot-camp. "Well let's give it a shot." Dad said of course he'd always agree with mom to keep the peace. "Now boys especially you Malcolm I need you to help me, when I'm at work you are in charge." "Me to?" Dewey asked beaming with joy at the thought of having authority over Reese. "Yes you to Dewey. Now before you guys get all gun-ho and happy I'm telling you now that anyone of you can be put in the same situation as Reese. I gulped at the thought of me in diapers, I was already an outcast cause of my freaky high IQ. We all agreed, and that is how we began as mom called it operation regress to success. Mom picked Reese up from detention and told him to go straight up to his room. Reese did as he was told, he was rubbing his butt again. Mom had spanked him again. Mom told Reese to move all of his things from his room. See we at that time all shared one room. But while mom was picking Reese up from school, dad, me and Dewey were busy cleaning our guess room of all of our junk. Reese didn't need to be told twice. He was finally getting his own room. Reese got all his stuff and went inside his new room. "Its perfect." He said as he surveyed the room in approval. "Wait a minute why is there a sleeping bag, where's my mattress. "Don't tell me you guys are too cheap ass to afford a mattress for me?" Reese asked in mock tone. "Your bed is coming tomorrow as is the rest of your stuff. We had to order them online, and pay a pretty penny for express delivery, now zip it with the comments mister!" Mom said. While Reese was unpacking his stuff Mom had me and Dad knock him to the floor and hold him down. "The hell get off me! What are you a couple of faggots! Get the fuck off!" Reese continued to curse and struggle to get free. Mom didn't waste no time she stripped Reese from the waist down and ignored all his protest as she powdered and eventually diapered him. She then slipped a cover over with a lock. "This will keep naughty boys from taking off their diapers. " We let Reese go and sure enough he tried to get out of his diapers. He tried and tried till he was too tired to try any more. "What the fuck Lois?" Reese said. "We'll have to work on that language and tone young man. Now shut up why I explain how this is gonna work." Malcolm if you will please, mom said as she finished trying to get Reese to shut up. I did what we talked about earlier. I popped a pacifier in Reese's mouth. "Before you spit it out know I'm prepared to have you go to school in your diapers, now what's it gonna be?" Mom asked. Reese stared her down and when he found she wasn't bluffing he submitted and sucked on his pacifier. I was in aw and Dewey was trying not to laugh the key word was trying cause he was laughing so much he even got dad to chuckle. I mean seeing my jerky older brother in a fluffy white diaper and sucking on a blue and red pacifier was too much. "Now that I got your attention here are the rules, from now on till I decide you are the baby of the family. What that means is that All of us even Dewey can discipline you. We are the only ones allowed to change you. If you get rough or defiant with me, your father or your brothers they can tell me, and I'll more time to your punishment. Right now starting tomorrow you'll have two weeks of punishment, if it's more is up to you." Mom said. And here we are today with me and the packs of diapers and a bottle of milk. You see my brother Reese was so pig headed he kept extending the punishment, now he lost the control of his bladder and bowels. Today mom has something special plan as punishment for Reese's accident in his new jeans she bought him for being good. He wasn't in diapers at the time. Now I'm gonna go and change my brother, while you decide if you want to here about how Reese finally submitted into his new role as baby of the family or skip ahead to the present where mom is having Reese donate all of his normal clothes to as she put it boys whose age better fit the clothes.

1333111221.content:
Meet Zack and Cody, twin 11 year old boys who have recently moved into the famous Tipton Hotel where their mother Carry has been performing at. The suite they live in is only a one bedroom so unfortunately their mother has to sleep in the living room and the boys must share a room together.

Since moving Cody has been waking up with wet sheets almost every night. His mother has finally had enough of all the extra laundry. But before she could even try to reason with her son he has come up with his own solution.

" Hey mom?" Said Cody.

"Hey bud. What's up?" Carry answers as she folds laundry in the living room.

"I've been thinking. I think I know how to stop my bed wetting."

"Oh yeah. Hows that?" She asks.

"What if I started wearing diapers? Like to bed and stuff." Cody suggests.

"You want to wear diapers?"

"Yea, then You wouldnt have to keep changing my sheets every morning and I wouldnt have to hog the bathroom every morning." Said Cody.

Cody was curious about wearing diapers and this was the perfect way for him to try it out. Plus he really did want to make things easier on his mother who had to put in a lot of extra effort on his behalf.

"Well if that's what you really think will help. I don't see why not." His mother agrees.

Later Carry takes Cody to the store where they are able to purchase him some new diapers. Cody was amazed at all the different types and he couldn't wait to try them. But he wasn't sure what kind to get. Carry picked out some cute toddler looking diapers that came in bigger sizes for kids who were having trouble with bedwetting.

As the two walk down the baby aisle to grab the rest of the supplies including baby powder, vaseline and some baby oil Carry notices Cody eyeing some of the other items on the shelves like the pacifiers and the bottles. She thinks to herself that maybe in time he will ask for those but not right now.

The two return home after buying everything they need. Carry places the bags down in the kitchen and pulls out the bag of diapers.

"Okay Cody let's try these on so we can make sure they fit and will protect you tonight. I'll help change you into them since I dont think you will be able to get them on tight enough." Said Carry.

She leads him by the hand and motions him to lay down on the couch. He does as hes told.

"What's Zack going to say when he sees me in diapers?" Asks cody worried about how his twin brother will tease him.

"Well he already teases you for the wet bed. But we can try and keep this a secret if you want."

Carry pulls down Cody's pants, she can see the nervousness in his face as he blushes as she starts to tug down his little boy underwear. As she removes them she notices the brown skids in the underwear.

"Cody have you been having trouble with pooping as well?" She asks.

"No mom. It's just hard to wipe it all sometimes." He responds.

"Well maybe i"ll have to help you with that as well."

Carry grabs a diaper from the bag and unfolds it before placing it under her sons bum using one hand to lift his legs up in the air. Once done she snuggly tapes it up around his waist.

"How does that feel?" She asks as she gets up and goes to throw out his stained undies. Cody gets up and examines himself in the mirror.

"Their comfy." He says.

"Good. Well I'll leave you just like that so you can get used to them before bed."

"What about when Zack sees me?" Cody asks worriedly.

Carry walks over to her son and gives him a hug while patting his new diapered bum. " It will be okay Cody. If Zack says anything I'll step in."

"Okay."

A couple hours later Cody is on the couch in nothing but his T-Shirt and Diaper. Zack returns home from school.

"Hey mom. Why wasn't Cody in school......" His sentence stopped when he saw Cody sitting on the couch in his diaper. He immediately begins to laugh. "Cody why are you in a diaper? He asks still laughing.

"Zack dont make fun of your brother. You know that he has been having accidents ever since we moved into the hotel. This is how we decided to deal with it. And if you make fun of him you will be grounded for the rest of your life. You got it?"

"Yes mom."

Zack goes and sits beside his brother on the couch whose watching TV.

"So why are you wearing a diaper?" Asks Zack.

Buffy and Cheryl were playing, when the latter whispered to the former, "Buff, you're wet."

         Buffy glanced down. "Oh, no."

         "Don't worry," said Cheryl. "I'll get you changed."

         Getting up, Buffy and Cheryl slipped back into school and into the bathroom. In one of the stalls, Buffy laid down and Cheryl helped her out of her diaper, upon which she changed into a new one.

         "Thank you, Cher," said Buffy.

         "Oh, think nothing of it," said Cheryl. "You did the same for me last week."

         Buffy realized that part of this reality shift had altered things so that this little girl Cheryl was her best friend. What now?

Due to Dawn's still being underage, the diaper affected her differently. It was also much more rapid. The instant she put the diaper on, her entire world shifted. Everything looked so big, and when she glanced down, she realized she was wearing a real baby diaper, one with a Sesame Street design. Her hair had been reduced to soft peach fuzz, and she no longer had any teeth.

         She was now crawling on the ground in nothing but a diaper and a pink Hello Kitty T-shirt, no older than nine months old. And she felt completely aware.

As in the novel, Harry arrives in the Potions dungeons and is mocked by the Slytherins with badges that read Support Cedric Diggory or Potter Stinks. All the Slytherins, especially Pansy Parkinson, laugh hard.

1433322222221111.content:
Rather than be a jungle-themed game, in this story Jumanji is baby-themed. Whenever a player has a turn, something babyish or childish happens to him or her - either a physical age regression or simply back to wearing a diaper. Alan and Sarah will be the first to experience this; however, Alan will be sucked into the game, so they each will only have one turn until 1995.

         There are two choices of what might happen:

         1) First, Sarah rolls and is magically transformed into a three-year-old girl in diapers with her twelve-year-old mind intact. Then, Alan is sucked into the game, where he becomes trapped in a nursery, where he is treated like a baby despite physically being twelve. This continues until he is let out by Judy and Peter twenty-six years later, which by that point toddler Sarah has aged up into an adult; she still remembers that she had to live ages three through twelve twice.


         2) First, Sarah rolls and is suddenly wearing a diaper despite being twelve. Then, Alan is sucked into the game, where he is magically transformed into a six-month-old baby and taken care of at an orphanage. When he is released in 1995, he is since grown up to the age of twenty-six, with full recollection that he had to live the first twelve years of his life twice. When they seek out Sarah, they discover she still has to wear diapers.

         Which option are you going for?

The instant her turn had passed, several thoughts went through Judy's mind. First of all, her legs felt cold suddenly -- that was her first clue that something was not right. Then she registered the fact that she could feel the cool surface of the floor upon which she sat. Lastly, she felt something thick and plastic between her legs. Glancing down, she saw the unvarnished truth -- her pants were gone, and she was wearing a diaper.

         "What the...?" she said. "I wasn't wearing this a moment ago. And where are my pants?"

         What now?

Yelled Rocket as he heard the sound. As he was trying to find the sound, an alarm went off, saying, "INTRUDER ALERT!!! INTRUDER ALERT!!! USING SLEEPING GAS ON ANY INTRUDERS!!!" Rocket tried to escape, but, to no avail, he failed to escape, falling into a deep slumber.

A couple seconds later, Rocket was dragged by a shadowy figure, in the shape of another raccoon, into a "living room" area. The shadowy raccoon figure then stripped Rocket of his jumpsuit, and put on a special diaper, and gave him some special treatment by mentally regressing him, causing him to retain his height size, but giving him the mind of a "adult-baby." And doing other things too.

As Rocket woke up, he groaned, while wondering what happened, he suddenly noticed he was in a diaper, all taped up with no escape. "Lemme out of this fuckin' thing!!!" Squealed Rocket with a notably high pitched voice. The shadowy figure came up to him, and talked to him. "Do you wanna spend time with your "friends???"". Said the raccoon figure. "F-F-Friends???" Rocket stuttered as to what he was talking about. "I only have one friend for you at the moment, but I'll get more as time goes by..." Said the raccoon.

Rocket, now with a bib from the raccoon that said, "I'm BoomBoom Raccoon!!!" walked into the room, complete with beds, televisions, video games, all the good stuff except for a bathroom or two.

"Yoooo man!!! What's up???" Said the raccoon who was Rocket's friend, Rowdie Raccoon. "Hey Rowdie!!! How have you been doing???" Rocket said to him, with his regression starting to become capable of reducing squeaks and stutters. "Say, we both have bibs on, mine says, "I'm A Rowdy Pooper!!!", and yours says "I'm BoomBoom Raccoon!!!" Said Rowdie as they were nuzzling each other on the nose.

"Hrrk!!! I feel pains in my stomach!!! And there's no bathroom!!!" Rocket said, clutching his stomach from the bowel pain. "Relax dude, it's natural for us to make a mess in our diapers." Rowdie said to Rocket. "Hrrrgh!!! I have to release it!!!" said Rocket as he felt the pain go away after doing so much strain on his body. "Hah... That's better..." Rocket said after he changed his diaper.

"Here's another friend for you guys!!!" Yelled the Raccoon as he got a third raccoon. "Rippity Raccoon, his name is..." "Sweet!!! Another roommate!!!" Yelled Rowdie. "And your bib says "I'm A Gassy Ripper!!!" Said Rocket.

While they were playing games, Rocket had to lift his leg up to release gas, and it inflated his diaper!!! "Grrrr... why is this so damn funny???" Rocket said as he started laughing. Rowdie and Rippity looked up to see Rocket on the ceiling, as there were no fans to pop the ballooned diaper. "Hey Rocket!!! Can you try inflating it even more???" Rowdie said as he was eating his food. "Sure can do, Rowdie!!!" Rocket said as he started to inflate it even more to the point where it could not even burst by any means!

As the Raccoon was coming with the fourth member, Rocket...
144311.title: BoomBoom Raccoon

choices: The man comes in with a new member.
The man come in to feed them.
1443112.content:
Rocket struggled to get the diaper off as he continued to fart. For some reason he couldn’t control himself now. He was just constantly fart, and inflating the diaper more and more. Ripper and Rowdy both laughed as his diaper ballooned and floated to the ceiling. He desperately attempted to take it off, but for some reason a part of him was enjoying this, despite how humiliating it was. He was so embarrassed, yet couldn’t help but find it a little funny. He was simultaneously crying and laughing as his padded butt his the ceiling.

While Rocket fidgeted with the waist of the diaper, his captor came in again. Rowdy and Ripper immediately turned their attention towards him. “What’s going on here?” He asked. “BoomBoom started farting and couldn’t stop.” Rowdy explained as he pointed to Rocket on the ceiling. Rocket had stopped bother with the inflated diaper, and was now covering his face with his paws out of embarrassment. He didn’t know who his captor was, but for some reason he didn’t want him seeing him like this. Rocket stifled chuckles and half-sobs.

His captor seemed bemused, “That’s alright. Don’t worry BoomBoom, we’ll get you down.” Rocket grit his teeth. “It’s not Boom-Boom, it’s Rocket…” He muttered as the captor got a ladder and went up to him. He wrapped the embarrassed Rocket in his arms and held him close to his chest. Rocket wanted to resist, but he couldn’t help but melt against the man’s touch and his burly, furry chest. Rocket couldn’t get a very good look at him before, but now saw he was a big sort of burly beastman, similar to Rocket himself, but much larger.

As he looked up at him, he brought him down and took him into the changing room. Rowdy and Ripper followed behind. “Now boys, I don’t want you taking your diapers off yourselves, you understand?” The raccoons all nodded, “However, if you ever want to have ‘fun’ like BoomBoom here was having, all you need to do is this.” He placed his thumbs on two straps on the front of Rocket’s diaper and loosened them, pulling out the front. Immediately there was a loud, gross farting noise as Rocket’s captured farts escaped, and filled the room with his stink. Rocket covered his face again in embarrassment as Rowdy and Ripper laughed.

“Geez, Rocket, what did you eat?” Rowdy asked, waving a paw in front of his face. “And I thought I stinked!” Ripper chuckled. As Rockets diaper shrunk back to normal size, his captor let go of the straps, and it was again pressed against Rocket’s furry body. His captor then got another diaper out from under the changing table, “It looks like you had a little accident earlier BoomBoom,. You’ll need a change too.” This prompted more giggles from the other two raccoons, and further embarrassment from Rocket. He hadn’t even realized he wet himself, but guessed he was so scared, he must’ve.

His captor got out a new diaper and changed the poor, humiliated raccoon. “there we go, good as new!” He laughed, patting the front of Rocket’s VERY puffy diaper, “Now what do we say…?” Rocket huffed indignantly as the man looked at him, “Hrrrng… Thank you, mister…” The man popped a pacifier into Rocket’s mouth, surprising him, but he couldn’t help but suckle on it “You can call me ‘Daddy’ if you want, I don’t mind.” Rocket was confused, but ‘daddy’ sounded so comforting. And the man had such a fatherly aura about him. Rocket gulped, “Tank’… yew… Dada…” He replied in a trance, mouth full of pacifier.

‘Daddy’ picked Rocket up and sat him down with his friends, before leaving the room once more. The two continued chuckling, while Rocket blushed, “S-Stop it!” He snapped at them, “Sorry Rocket, you’re just so cute~!” Rowdy laughed. “Hey, I wanna try what Rocket did!” Ripper gleefully declared. “Me too!” chimed in Rowdy. Both raccoons readied themselves, before unleashing a wave of farts into their diapers, inflating the fabric until they were the size of beachballs. Rocket couldn’t help but giggle as he watched his friends inflate their diapers with their farts. Then, the two raccoons put their paws on the straps, and loosened them, letting out the rude sounds and smells that had filled their diapers and stinking up the playroom further.

Rocket laughed, waving a paw in front of his face, “Man, you guys reek! And you say I stink?” He chuckled. He was laughing so much, he started peeing AGAIN, dying the front of his new a golden hue, and filling the crotch with such pleasant warmth. Rowdy and Ripper were laughing a lot too. “I guess I am a gassy Ripper!” He smiled, bloating the back of it with more stinky farts. Rocket was confused about all of this, but was actually enjoying himself. “Hey, I want to do it again!” He raised his leg, letting out a big, stinky fart and inflating his own diaper once more. It wasn’t so scary now that he learned what to do.

Together, the three raccoons laughed and played, farting into their inflating diapers and happily bouncing around the room and bouncing off one another until…
1443112.title: Rocket's Misadventures.

14433222221121.content:
When Ariel awoke, she was much smaller than before. Her first thought was a sense of joy that she now had legs, but then she noted that they were a lot smaller and pudgier than they probably should be. In fact, he entire body was. She had her suspicions as to what this must mean, but it was only when she tried to get up and realize she couldn't that she saw the truth.

         She was just a little baby, probably less than six months old. She was completely naked, except for a plain white disposable diaper, and she was completely abandoned.

         This wasn't the plan, she thought in distress, her childish emotions bringing her on the verge of tears. If she had to be a baby again, none of this was worth it. She couldn't win the prince's love like this!

         Worse still, she knew she couldn't take care of herself like this, which meant she was going to need help. With that thought in mind, Ariel gave in to her inner child and started bawling like the baby she now was.

         Who finds her?
14433222221121.title: A young baby, dressed in nothing but a white di...

14433222221122.content:
Ariel awoke on the beach, and at first she was thrilled. The meeting with Ursula had paid off - she was human; she had legs. Overcome with joy, she took advantage of her new legs and began running around the beach with a newfound energy, But then her mood began to slip, as she began to realize something was not right. She was a lot shorter than she had been before. . . .

         Ariel stopped on the spot and looked down at her tiny body. She was dressed in a small yellow sundress, which barely covered the pink diaper she was wearing. Meanwhile, her feet were completely bare. What really made her new fate clear was the fact that she could still see traces of baby fat. There was no denying it. She was just a toddler, no older than three.

         Unable to speak because of the witch's deal, Ariel thought, No, this was not the plan. I didn't want to be a little girl again!

         Crying hysterically, she ran toward the palace, knowing she would need to find help. Not even watching where she was going, she crashed right into someone much taller than she was now.

         "Well, hello there, little girl," said a male voice. "Where did you come from? Where are your mommy and daddy?"

         Who is it?
